function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex model representation may lead to misunderstanding or misinterpretation.","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of disease propagation in the smart city.","Mitigation":"Provide clear explanations and documentation of the model's variables and equations.","Technologies":"Visualization tools for presenting complex models, such as interactive diagrams or simulations.","People":"Researchers, policy makers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies, and technical experts."},{"Description":"Lack of clarity around model variables and equations may hinder effective analysis and decision-making.","Impact":"Inability to make informed decisions for disease control and prevention in the smart city.","Mitigation":"Standardize variable definitions and equations, and provide detailed guidelines for model analysis.","Technologies":"Model validation and verification tools, data visualization software.","People":"Data analysts, epidemiologists, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and data analysis experts."}]}
